user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to manage user accounts
dod: administrators can create, update, & delete user accounts

user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to manage parking spaces
dod: administrators can create, update, & delete parking spaces

user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to assign users to spaces so that those users will have preference for their parking spaces
dod: administrators can assign, and deassign users to parking spaces

user_story: as an administrator, I want seperate user accounts to be denied administrative access
dod: two users types; administrator, and user with the latter not having access to appropriate CRUD operations

user_story: as an administrator, or user, I want to be able to login and out of the system
dod: users can login and log out given the corrrect credentials

user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to manage bookings
dod: administrators can create, update, & delete bookings for parking spaces

user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to specify a range in time, and/or spaces, and/or users to recalculate automatic bookings
dod: administrators can recalulcate automatic bookings based on a filtered list of available spaces by either or all of time, spaces, users

user_story: as an administrator, I want to be able to have the system automatically schedule bookings for a given period or time / spaces / users, for a given frequency.
dod: administrators can schedule recalulcations based on multiple criteria; time, space, users, based of a supplied frequency (daily, weekly, monthly).

user_story: as a user, I want to be able to manage my working days
dod: users can add, and update their working days for use in the generated bookings

user_story: as a user, I want to be able to manage my bookings
dod: users can view, and cancel their bookings

user_story: as a user, I want to view bookings based on search criteria
dod: users can view all bookings, adding additional criteria on users, spaces, and date if supplied.
